&Byaq~gktE tasyai# duqScarmAq yA pra#liqKatEq tasyai# Kalaqtira#pamAqrI yA&&~gktE tasyai# kAqNO yA daqtO dhAva#tEq tasyai$ SyAqvadaqnq. yA naqKAni# nikRuqntatEq tasyai# kunaqKI yA kRuqNattiq tasyai$ klIqbO yA rajju(gm)# sRuqjatiq tasyA# 
uqd-bandhu#kOq yA paqrNEnaq piba#tiq tasyA# uqnmAdu#kOq yA KaqrvENaq piba#tiq tasyai# KaqrvastiqsrO rAtrI$rvraqtaM ca#rEda~jjaqlinA# vAq pibEqdaKa#rvENa vAq ( ) pAtrE#Na praqjAyai# gOpIqthAya# || 7
(yath sO#maqpAna#M - tE - vRuqkNAt- tasyaq nA&&Sya#M - ~MvadEtaq -mAru#kOq yA -&Ka#rvENa vAq - trINi# ca) (A1)
